item.title: Report X-2023100098
item.description:
Report X-2023100098

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-07T18:15:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-28
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER RECIEVED A CALL FROM THE UNLOAD WALL FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON ARRIVAL RESPONDER IDENTIFIED SAID LEAKING PACKAGE, PLACED PACKAGE IN SPILL TRAY FOR TRANSPORT TO THE DMP AREA, AND TRANSPORTED LEAKING PACKAGE TO DMP AREA FOR PROPER DISPOSAL
